summary:
Japanese graduated shiatsu therapist who now gives private lessons to people in need since 2016, International teacher with cum lauda diploma for classical shiatsu from Tokyo and from the Japanese Cultural Center in Amsterdam, Holland. Has over 40 years of Oriental training and experience. 
Accredited lecturer and teacher by the European Shiatsu Society where he functioned as the invited representative of Shiatsu in Holland in 2007 at the Kiental Shiatsu School in Zwitserland where he taught advanced techniques to overcome fear and treated patients with advanced neurological disease for the attending students and therapists to learn from.

At the 4th International Congress for Shiatsu in October - 2009, for the FFST( French Federation for Traditional Shiatsu).
In 2011 at The Zhong Nederlands beroepsvereniging voor Traditional Chinese Medicine), invited to teach member therapists in acupuncture and shiatsu.

International public speaker/teacher on this subject and its roots since 1972. English and Dutch languages. Runs and teaches at the Dutch School for Classical Shiatsu in the Hague. More than 100 students. 
Medically qualified by the Dutch Institute for Psychological and Holistic Treatment (NVGN) in Holland. 
Intent on the expansion and appreciation of this subject through exposing audiences to seminars at which live and public audiences can experience self-empowering techniques to combat stress and psychological and emotional disturbances and their consequences. 


Specialties: An extraordinary developed observation and interpretation ability (Bo-Shin).

A powerful ability to put things in perspective.
An accomplished International lecturer, teacher and demonstrator of Shiatsu and Do-in.

Deep core diagnosis and effective treatment.

Unique abilities and insight obtained by a lifetime of diagnosing, treating and teaching people who are expanding in their own ways armed with practical knowledge the average person does not possess .
Now giving private lessons online so people are safe. School courses can now be followed Live online with Zoom

A dry sense of humour.

treasury_media.title: NSKS Shiatsu Open Day Sunday  29th August 11am (free to join)
treasury_media.description: Schedule - Open Day ONLINE see https://www.shiatsu.nl/en/open-dag/

treasury_media.title: Copy of BASIC COURSE online EN SEPT 2021.png
treasury_media.description: Get yourself back where you belong with you. This course is online and offline. The best introduction to Shiatsu and DO-IN. Yes; we are bilingual. Come and indeed feel good the first evening. We have given this course for almost 30 years. The diploma students love it too. Go to https://www.shiatsu.nl/en/basiscursus/

treasury_media.title: NSKS SHIATSU BASIC COURSE NL 01 SEPT 2021
treasury_media.description: This course will bring you much relief and fun. Find out more at www.shiatsu.nl - We have been giving this course for 30 years. The best introduction and practise of Shiatsu and DO-IN. Online with Zoom and live in the Dojo. Don't miss it.

treasury_media.title: We are ready to receive you online
Shiatsu Kawada 2020-2021 EN
treasury_media.description:
A special year with Yuichi Kawada Sensei (author of 'Essential Shiatsu'), accredited as postgraduate education and higher vocational education. A profound study of the eight extra meridians, the history thereof, and application in practice and diagnosis. Fully accredited by KTNO (hbo-niveau), Zhong, and NVST, VBAG, LVNG, CAT, Shiatsu Vereniging Nederland and VIV. Members of these professional associations will receive a 10% discount on all parts of the training.

Classes are in English

treasury_media.title: Shiatsu-Kawada-2020-2021 NL
treasury_media.description:
Een bijzondere jaar met Yuichi Kawada Sensei, als nascholing erkend op hbo-niveau. Een diepgaande studie van de theorie en historie van 8 extra meridianen en de toepassing daarvan in de praktijk bij het stellen van diagnoses. Volledig geaccrediteerd door de KTNO (hbo-niveau), Zhong, en NVST, VBAG, LVNG, CAT, Shiatsu Vereniging Nederland en VIV. Leden van deze organisaties ontvangen een korting van 10% op alle onderdelen.

De lessen zijn in het Engels.

treasury_media.title: Shiatsu Kawada 2019-20 - Deep level 8 curious meridian diagnosis and treatment with Japanese Master
treasury_media.description: Master Kawada teaches exclusively at the Dutch school for classical shiatsu in the Netherlands. His course of study of the 8 curious meridians is his advanced specialty.  The course may be followed by external therapists and students with knowledge of bodywork and the 12 meridians. Accredited by the K.T.N.O the Zhong association for TCM.  All members of the beroepsorganisaties who recognize our school receive a 10% discount.

treasury_media.title: NSKS Shiatsu Kawada UK 2019-20
treasury_media.description:
A special year with Y. Kawada Sensei (author - Essential Shiatsu) (accredited as postgraduate education- higher vocational education) A profound study of the eight extra meridians, the history thereof, and application in practice and diagnosis.
Begins 1st August 2019 Yuichi Kawada - Sensei – (accredited by the ministry of health in Japan) Sensei

Medische Basis Kennis with the N.V.G.N. in Amsterdam

profile_positions.company: Dutch International School for Classical Shiatsu
profile_positions.description:
Penetrating and advanced techniques for many diseases and problems.
Original diplomas from Japan.
Live Lessons for people with unusual problems who have not been helped through regular channels.
Collegial contact with Japanese professionals
Nearly 40 years of practical and theoretical expertise
profile_positions.title: director

profile_positions.company: Dutch International School for Classical Shiatsu
profile_positions.description: Professional Japanese Shiatsu under tutelage of 3 Japanese masters One of which works exclusively for this school. Penetrating and traditional oriental diagnosis and treatment - 4 year fully accredited and licensed HBO Level therapists diploma course with basic courses throughout Holland and Belgium given by school members, teachers and therapists licensed by the Dutch School of Classical Shiatsu. Listed as high quality school for external and further studies by the Dutch Institute for Shiatsu Therapists (nvst.nl - dutch language only) and the Dutch Association for Social and Medical Wellbeing of the general society (B.A.T.C) (Dutch language only). The KTNO accreditation institute and BATC has honoured our diploma course with the HBO level accreditation. Postgraduate and advanced studies fully accredited by the Dutch Institute Zhong (Traditional Chinese Medicine), N.V.S.T., L.V.N.G.,  V.B.A.G.. Shiatsu Vereniging Nederland en Verbond Van Energetisch Therapeuten (VVET)
profile_positions.title: Owner

company.name: Dutch International School for Classical Shiatsu

profile_positions.company: Dutch International School for Classical Shiatsu
profile_positions.description: Worked with directors of shiatsu institutions within Europe (ESA) within France, Belgium, Germany and Switzerland to further the integration of accredited styles of shiatsu of the most experienced teachers and organisers in the field thereby opening our international doors.
profile_positions.title: International Director

profile_positions.company: Dutch International School for Classical Shiatsu
profile_positions.description: Al meer dan 30 jaar bekend en erkend in het geven van Private Lessons en training voor mensen en groepen met hoge stress gerelateerde functies en persoonlijke stress situaties. By bringing someone with you, they will be taught what to do for you to help you with your problems using the lessons they receive which are relevant for the person who comes with them. Think about how you can help your child, family or friends and colleagues.
profile_positions.title: Private Lessons

company.name: Invited as teacher for member Shiatsu therapists - advanced techniques at Beroepsvereniging de Zhong

profile_positions.company: Invited as teacher for member Shiatsu therapists - advanced techniques at Beroepsvereniging de Zhong
profile_positions.description: Invited to teach shiatsu and acupuncturists, doctors and therapists who are members of the association. The subjects taught and demonstrated interactively with members were effective techniques in treating clients while increasing diagnostic perceptive awareness in the therapeutic approach. Especially within the sphere of handling ki diagnostic awarenes.
profile_positions.title: Teacher and demonstrator

profile_positions.description:
Invited to teach shiatsu therapists who are members of the association. The subjects taught and demonstrated interactively with members were effective techniques in treating clients to reverse abjection, tiredness and loss of will while increasing perceptive awareness in therapeutic approach.

Article about Alan Nash appeared in the associations magazine in 2010
profile_positions.title: Invited as teacher for member Shiatsu therapists - advanced techniques

profile_positions.description: Invited to demonstrate and teach advanced Shiatsu techniques and diagnosis at the International Congress of the French Federation for Traditional Shiatsu in Le Canet, France 17 & 18 October 2009 as representative for the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Invited lecturer and teacher

company.name: Schule für Shiatsu Hamburg + International School Of Shiatsu Kiental

profile_positions.company: Schule für Shiatsu Hamburg + International School Of Shiatsu Kiental
profile_positions.description: Representative Classical Shiatsu lecturer and demonstrator for the Netherlands at the ISS (International Shiatsu Society) conference in Kiental, Switzerland in october 2007 on the subject of fear and how to combat fear practically and successfully. Videos on http://www.youtube.com/fieldexplorer . Articles? See www.shiatudutch.com under Downloads and Links.
profile_positions.title: Invited lecturer and demonstrator
